timeline.message:
Improve Test_Thread failure diagnostics

Related to #9915. The failure we're tracking re-occurred, but in a
different place. I've tried to over them all.

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: The local variable result becomes useless with this change. Unless we expect to revert this later, the local variables should be removed (here and in test_join2() and test_join3()).
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText: What is the purpose of the comments referring to 'killer' (there is nothing available here by that name)?
timeline.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText:
I couldn't say, just keeping it consistent with what was already there.
I've removed the hopefully obsolete comments.
replies.author: pshipton
